tasks.task: Participate in agricultural training workshops on vegetable grafting.
subtasks: Attend morning theoretical sessions from 9 AM to 1 PM.
Listen to lectures on local research in grafting vegetables.
Learn about grafting tomatoes and sweet peppers on rootstocks.
Understand the benefits of grafting in reducing disease losses.
Acknowledge the role of integrated pest management (IPM).
Recognize the importance of vegetable grafting for food security.

tasks.task: Apply learned grafting techniques on farms.
subtasks: Implement grafting methods to protect crops from biotic and abiotic stresses.
Select appropriate vegetable varieties suitable for grafting.
Monitor crop performance and adjust practices as needed.
